SourceString: This reward grants the pioneer an additional inventory slot
This reward provides the pioneer with a map that can be accessed at any time
This upgrade unlocks new functionality that lets the pioneer overclock factory buildings.
This upgrade allows the pioneer to view the efficiency of each building.
Complete Space Elevator Phase {PhaseNum} to unlock Tier

Context: The HUB now has a flushable toilet. Players can interact with it which opens an inventory, where players can flush items.

VariableDescription:
{BUTTON} = text, key name
{NAME} = text, localized building name (HUB)
